scripts.init-dve-core: cd ./divinevoxel/core && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/core/dist
scripts.init-dve-iwg: cd ./divinevoxel/iwg && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/iwg/dist
scripts.init-dve-physics: cd ./divinevoxel/physics && npm run build && cd ../../divinevoxel && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/physics/dist
scripts.init-dve-player: cd ./divinevoxel/player && npm run build && cd ../../divinevoxel && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/player/dist
scripts.init-dve-data: cd ./divinevoxel/data && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/data/dist
scripts.init-dve-entities: cd ./divinevoxel/entities && npm run build && cd ../../divinevoxel && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/entities/dist
scripts.init-dve-react: cd ./divinevoxel/react && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/react/dist
scripts.init-dve-all: npm run init-dve-core && npm run init-dve-iwg && npm run init-dve-physics && npm run init-dve-player && npm run init-dve-data && npm run init-dve-entities
scripts.init-ds-binary: cd ./divinestar/binary && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/binary/dist
scripts.init-ds-voxelspaces: cd ./divinestar/voxelspaces && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/voxelspaces/dist
scripts.init-ds-threads: cd ./divinestar/threads && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/threads/dist
scripts.init-ds-shaders: cd ./divinestar/shaders && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/shaders/dist
scripts.init-ds-utils: cd ./divinestar/utils && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/utils/dist
scripts.init-ds-indexdb: cd ./divinestar/indexdb && npm run build && cd ../../ && npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/indexdb/dist
scripts.init-ds-all: npm run init-ds-binary && npm run init-ds-voxelspaces && npm run init-ds-threads && npm run init-ds-shaders && npm run init-ds-utils && npm run init-ds-indexdb
scripts.init-all: npm run init-ds-all && npm run init-dve-all
